title: PBE signup error 505
body: So basically everytime I try to go to the link for PBE it says this "ERROR 505 Something has gone hextechnically wrong,the maintenance golems are working to fix that".Any ideas? Anything is helpful really...

replies.body: We've received a few reports on this issue!  We're currently investigating this for more information, so grab a screenshot of the error and URL bar and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll take a look individually and reply back as soon we we're able!
